Title: Provides that New York city correction officers may file for disability without ten years of service
Summary: Provides that New York city correction officers may file for disability without ten years of service.
LawCode: Amd ยง507-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to disability retirement of certain New York city correction members
